title: PitchBook: European VC investments rose 5% YoY to a post-pandemic high of €66B in 2025; AI-related deals accounted for 35%+, or €23.5B, up from €17.7B in 2024 (Financial Times)
tags: Financial Times;PitchBook: European VC investments rose 5% YoY to a post-pandemic high of€66B in 2025; AI-related deals accounted for 35%+, or €23.5B, up from €17.7B in 2024
